mapper.select: /* StudyAchieve.uptData */ SELECT years, count(sid) AS cnt FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(sdt, '%Y') AS years, sid FROM tb_datasales) A GROUP BY years ORDER BY years

/* StudyAchieve.getStudyDataView */ SELECT sid ,studynm ,sosuk ,readuser ,partuser ,purpose ,cont ,DATE_FORMAT(sdt, '%Y-%m-%d') AS sdt ,DATE_FORMAT(edt, '%Y-%m-%d') AS edt ,DATE_FORMAT(regDt, '%Y-%m-%d') AS regDt ,CASE WHEN state = '2' THEN '접수' WHEN state = '3' THEN '승인' WHEN state = '4' THEN '반려' ELSE '신청' END AS state ,state as statecode ,reason ,itemlist FROM tb_datasales WHERE sid = #{sid}
/* StudyAchieve.getDataView */ SELECT bid ,gubun ,subject ,cont ,summary ,DATE_FORMAT(regDt, '%Y-%m-%d') AS regDt FROM tb_study_achieve WHERE bid = #{bId}
